p: The pollutant emissions identified in the different stages of the process by way of the inventory analysis were considered as they relate to the selection of the environmental impact category: ozone layer depletion. Fig.Â 2 shows the identification and selection of all categories to be analyzed for the characterization and impact assessment according to the environmental action of the process. The impacts were obtained using the SIMA Pro 7.1 software package and applying the EPD 2007 methodology to the data. Given that the data sets are large and occupy many pages, they are not included in this article [ 12, 20].
